com.kontakt.sdk.android.device

Class BeaconDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.device.BeaconDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable, Comparable<BeaconDevice>

    public class BeaconDevice
extends Object
implements Parcelable, Comparable<BeaconDevice>
    Class representing a real Beacon device. Please, note that in the SDK there is also another Beacon class (Beacon) which represents a JSON model for a Beacon and is accessible while interacting with the REST Client.

      static class  BeaconDevice.DistanceSort
      Distance Sort is part of BeaconManager's configuration (BeaconManager.Configuration).
